nodes.text: Eara Lota was a Human female and the rightful heir to the throne of Empress Teta during the Galactic Civil War.

Raised in the capital city Cinnagar, Eara Lota was the niece of Emperor Alor Keto, the ruler of Empress Teta. During her youth, Lota protested the living conditions that the prisoners of Ronika were subjected to, as well as the working environments of miners throughout the system.
